title: bizarre monoline Art Nouveau typeface
content:
Hi all   
   
I have no ideas what this is, but I would love to get my paws on it   
   
Any ideas? ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090605095707im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/19721.jpg)
author: rich

comments.content:
At first glance, I though it might have been something by [Ray Larabie](http://web.archive.org/web/20090605095707/http:/www.larabiefonts.com/fonts/a.html) - but apparently no...   
   
I do like your comparision to Arnold B

Art Nouveau high-tech. Heh. I actually like the idea.   
_Tr_
reminds me on the stuff this parisian agency did for bj

It got mentionned for that movie poster ID, _now_ I   
remember! I wanted to link to the thread, but for the   
life of me I couldn't recall what to search for.
